text: Horacio Allegue Lamas (born 7 March 1972) is a Spanish rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Spain Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ferrol (comarca)
title: Horacio Allegue
